episodes.title: Foisted!
episodes.plot: Larry tries to rid himself of an inept assistant, offends Jeff's barber, and gets into hot water over a new project.

episodes.title: The Pickle Gambit
episodes.plot: Larry reaches out to a familiar face, gives a hotel guest sartorial advice, and tries to create a diversion to help a friend's nephew.

episodes.title: A Disturbance in the Kitchen
episodes.plot: Larry turns to a writer for advice, and he gets ticketed by an overzealous cop while searching for Susie's "little sister."

episodes.title: Running with the Bulls
episodes.plot: Larry's therapist accuses him of overstepping doctor-patient bounds; Susie grows suspicious of Jeff; and Larry bribes an usher at a funeral.

episodes.title: Thank You for Your Service
episodes.plot: Larry fails to be suitably patriotic when meeting Jeff's future son-in-law; he also tries to reset his relationships with his mail carrier and security guard.

episodes.title: The Accidental Text on Purpose
episodes.plot: Larry invents an ingenious ploy for getting his friends out of relationship jams; he also upsets Funkhouser's new girlfriend.

episodes.title: Namaste
episodes.plot: Larry angers a hot yoga teacher, has an auspicious first date, and seethes over a run-in with an unfair Uber driver.

episodes.title: Never Wait for Seconds!
episodes.plot: Larry saves a line-cutter from an angry mob and deals with a tip-flipper.

episodes.title: The Shucker
episodes.plot: Larry is blackmailed by an employee and tormented by someone from his past; he and Jeff pitch a new creative venture.

episodes.title: Fatwa!
episodes.plot: On Jeff and Susie's daughter Sammi's wedding day, Larry has a scheduling conflict, takes issue with some work associates, and hosts a pair of ungrateful houseguests.
